item.title: WIP – Mocks: is more always better?
item.description: Mocking and stubbing are, without any doubt, important techniques for a modern software developer to master. But can there be too much of the mocking goodness?

item.title: WIP – Sprinkle sprinkle Kotlin sugar - small big shifts in test preparation
item.description: On Kotling helping to bringing the joy back to TDD
